import React, { useState } from 'react' import './createNewProject.css' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import CPT0Industry from './cpt0Industry' import CPT1NameDescription from './cpt1NameDescription' import CPT2StartDateProjectionPeriod from './cpt2StartDateProjectionPeriod' import CPT3CurrencyTaxDiscount from './cpt3CurrencyTaxDiscount' import CPT4SaleTrends from './cpt4SaleTrends' import CPT5Picture from './cpt5Picture' const CreateNewProject = (props) => { const shallowCreateProject = useSelector(state => state.projects.shallowCreateProject) const [currentStep, setCurrentStep] = useState(shallowCreateProject.name==='เทมเพลตเปล่า'?0:1) const onStepChange = (destinationNumber) => { if(destinationNumber >= 0) setCurrentStep(destinationNumber) } const createProject = (data) => { console.log('create porject'); console.log(data); } return (
สร้างโปรเจกธุรกิจใหม่
{`ขั้นตอนที่ ${currentStep}/6`}
{currentStep===0? : currentStep===1? : currentStep===2? : currentStep===3? : currentStep===4? : }
{currentStep<=4? : }
) } export default CreateNewProject
